name: R2Jew2 Art Prints
description:
Need some cool nerdy art for your barren walls?  Or how's about you take those prom pics off your fridge doors and spruce them up with some artwork instead?

All our prints are made in the USA, come enclosed with lovely archival quality backing board and sleeve, and are ready to be mounted in a frame or pinned to any wall.

Two sizes available—pick ur poison!

name: in love with lisa (computer tee)
description: one of steve jobs finest creations, lisa was released by apple in 1978, she didn’t sell well... we loved her vintage look though so are giving her another chance to shine on torso's everywhere. lisa loves you... don't reject her again. This design is a Might Tees original and won't be found anywhere else. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: say anything (steve jobs as Lloyd Dobler mac classic tee)
description: For a short time, just $29 $25. Steve Jobs as Lloyd Dobler Mashup! This design was one of our most popular EVER. We sold out quite a while ago, but in honor of Steve, we're bringing Steve as Lloyd Dobler back for a limited reprint on a black tee. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: his steveness (steve jobs think different word art tee)
description:
For a short time, just $29 $25. The original Steve Jobs word art tee made from the words of that famous 1997 Apple "Think Different" commercial. This design is another one of our our most popular Steve Jobs tribute designs. We sold out quite a while ago, but in honor of current events, and since many friends and fans are asking us, we're bringing Steve as Lloyd Dobler back for a limited reprint on a black tee. We're thrilled to be donating 50% of the profits on this design to product red, an organization founded by U2's bono to help end aids in africa. Both, Steve and Apple cared deeply for product red and donated to it generously. in steve's honor, we thought we'd do the same. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

Words from the ad: Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. But the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

name: The AutoComplete Cult of Mac Collab Tee
description: New! If iOS had been around at the time, Jerry Maguire might've said this instead. This design is a Might exclusive and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. We've partnered with our good friends over at the Web's most popular Apple blog, cultofmac.com, to bring you our first iOS inspired design. This unisex tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We've recently switched to new, even higher quality tees, so please be sure to peep the size chart here before you order.

name: little indian, artist series #2
description: Our second artist series design. This one is from amazing local artist and painter Emil Ny. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: captain picard (make it so) tee
description: New! Crew not taking your orders seriously? Don't have the amount of Trek cred you feel you rightly deserve? Feeling like a red shirt? Let the classy and sensual Captain Picard make your point for you. Your orders are not to be ignored. You're classy, sensitive, but when times get tough, you have no problem putting up the shields and setting phasers to KILL. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: what would geordi laforge do tee
description: Let's face it, when you've got klingons on your port and romulans at your starboard, you're gonna need to shift shields on the fly. This isn't the time to put some inexperienced cadet in charge of your dilithium crystals—you're gonna need the real deal. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: the admiral (ackbar ascii art tee)
description: New! From the depths of forums and Digg comment threads, we bring to thee this Ackbar inspired ascii design your inner geek will heart. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We're offering this tee in unisex and women's sizes: peep the size chart here.

name: R2Jew2
description: New! The only Droid in the galaxy who will beep with excitement for eight crazy days and nights come December! Sure, other units might be faster or more mobile, but do they come with a built-in menorah? This design is a Might original mashup and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This unisex tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. Tee is a slimmer fitting cut so be sure to peep the size chart here.

name: The OG Space Cowboy
description: New! A blaster in hand, steed underneath, he rides over dunes and valley's defending from snow monsters and empire scum alike. As tough as they come, as ruthless as they get. No Imperial AT-AT is safe. This design is a Might original mashup and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This unisex tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. Tee is a slimmer fitting cut so be sure to peep the size chart here.

name: Rockem Sockem Might Bot!
description: New! The envy of A.I.! The Johnny of the 5's! Might Bot makes his debut tee appearance in this vintage Rockem Sockem Robot ad inspired design and is ready to protect your torso from all malfunctioning droids. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This unisex tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We've recently switched to new, even higher quality tees, so the sizes for this tee are different than our others. Be sure to peep the size chart here.

name: One Wolf, One Moon
description: New! Remember that awesome tee you used to see around with three wolves howling at the moon? Ok, well, maybe not. But we loved it so recreated our own version for all current-day nerds to love and enjoy. Wolf comes fully geared in fur coat and geek-centric thick-framed glasses. Ready to leap from your torso and howl. This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. This unisex tee is 100% designed, cut, sewn, and printed right here in the beautiful USA. We've recently switched to new, even higher quality tees, so the sizes for this tee are different than our others. Be sure to peep the size chart here.

name: mr friendly (pedo bear ascii art tee)
description: Sale! Now just $30 $9.99. from the depths of forums and digg comment threads, we bring to thee new designs we've dubbed "death by ascii art!" not sure where the death part fits in but we thought it sounded cool.. we infused this organic cotton tee with the very essence of pedobear. this is as close as you can get to him without getting fondled... This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. shirt is a super high quality, super soft organic cotton tee. shirt color is a blueish grey, we call it coal grey. style and shirt are unisex. you can check out our size chart here.

name: steve-in-sane (steve jobs bowie mashup tee)
description:
now just 31.99 $23.99! our sweet new steve-in-sane mashup is one part 20-something hipster steve jobs, one part bowie's aladdin sane, and one part 90's apple rainbow. This design is a Might original mashup and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever.

design is lovingly screen printed onto one of our resilient organic cotton shirts with our vibrant eco-friendly water based inks. shirt color is a dark bluish grey, we call it coal grey style and shirt are unisex. you can check out our size chart here.

name: my friend billy (mays ascii art tribute tee)
description: now just $27.99$4.99! from the depths of forums and digg comment threads, we bring to thee new designs we've dubbed "death by ascii art!" not sure where the death part fits in but we thought it sounded cool.. we infused this organic cotton tee with the the memory and spirit of billy mays. we miss seeing his dyed black beard on tv every 15 seconds. now you can take a little billy with you wherever you go. shirt is a super high quality, super soft organic cotton tee. shirt color is a sandstone tan, we call it earth sandstone. style and shirt are unisex. you can check out our size chart here.

name: the one (mac classic tee)
description: on sale! now just $28 $8.99 he needs no introduction. keyboards love him, pc's want to be him. hipster steve's love child is reborn... This design is a Might original and won't be found anywhere else. And as per the usual, we print these in limited quantities and once we sell out, we'll most likely be out forever. shirt color is a dark bluish grey, we call it coal grey style and shirt are unisex. you can check out our size chart here.

name: the gentleman (steve wozniak tribute tee)
description: on sale! get your hands on woz while you can, now just $31.99 $5.99 we bring to you steve wozniak. known for his programming prowess, dance move repetoire, and sweet gentility... he’s the unsung hero, and so to him we give this tribute... design is lovingly screen printed onto one of our eco-blend shirts (part organic cotton, part recycled polyester, part naturally occuring rayon) using our vibrant eco-friendly water based inks. shirt color is a a medium grey, we call it heather grey. style and shirt are unisex. you can check out our size chart here.
